lines.text: [Vinson's cavalry patrol hurriedly buries a dead trooper]
Collins, that deep enough. Roll him in and cover him up. Let's move!
You mean without reading the Good Book?
If he needs our help to make it upstairs, he's in worse shape than he looks.
I need a six-foot hole dug. Any volunteers?
Don't look at me, Sergeant. I'm too overcome with grief.
Well, I certainly can't do that!
All right, I'll be the goat. Half the tobacco?
Collins, three feet will be plenty. He was only half a man.
